trans-unit.source: Represents a setter that applies a property value.
trans-unit.target: 代表適用於屬性值的 setter。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Style>s and the different types of triggers (classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase>) use Setters to apply property values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Style>s 和不同類型的觸發程序 (繼承自類別<xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase>) 使用 Setter 將套用屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase></xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: Note that you must specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value%2A> properties on a Setter for the setter to be meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須同時指定<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value%2A>為有意義的 setter Setter 的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A>

trans-unit.source: If one or both properties are not set, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定一或兩個屬性，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> class with the specified property and value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>類別具有指定的屬性和值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> to apply the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>套用<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>以。</xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The value to apply to the property.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> class with the specified property, value, and target name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>類別指定的屬性、 值和目標名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> to apply the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>套用<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>以。</xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The value to apply to the property.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the child node this <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> is intended for.
trans-unit.target: 子節點的名稱這<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>適合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to which the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*> will be applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>將會套用。</xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Note that you must specify both the Property and <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value%2A> properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> or an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須指定這兩個屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Setter>，否則會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> to which the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*> will be applied.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>的<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>將會套用。</xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null。

trans-unit.source: The Property property cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Property 屬性不可為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified Property property cannot be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 指定的屬性的屬性不能處於唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*> is not valid for the type of the specified Property.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>指定屬性的型別無效。</xref:System.Windows.Setter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Handles cases where a markup extension provides a value for a property of <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 處理標記延伸位置提供的值之屬性的情況下<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This is the method referenced by an applied <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute> attribute at the class level, which means that this method processes all attempts to set values of <xref:System.Windows.Setter> with a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 這是套用所參考方法<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>類別層級，這表示這個方法會處理所有嘗試都將值設定屬性<xref:System.Windows.Setter>搭配標記延伸。</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You do not typically call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有不通常直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The object where the markup extension sets the value.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中的標記延伸設定的值。

trans-unit.source: Data that is relevant for markup extension processing.
trans-unit.target: 資料的相關標記延伸處理。

trans-unit.source: Handles cases where a type converter provides a value for a property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 處理的案例，其中型別轉換子的屬性中提供的值<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This is the method referenced by an applied <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute> attribute at the class level, which means that this method processes all attempts to set values of <xref:System.Windows.Setter> with a type converter.
trans-unit.target: 這是套用所參考方法<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute>類別層級，這表示這個方法會處理所有嘗試都將值設定屬性<xref:System.Windows.Setter>具有型別轉換子。</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You do not typically call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有不通常直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The object where the type converter sets the value.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中型別轉換子設定的值。

trans-unit.source: Data that is relevant for type converter processing.
trans-unit.target: 相關的資料型別轉換器處理。

trans-unit.source: Signals the object that initialization is starting.
trans-unit.target: 表示物件正在啟動初始設定。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Setter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Setter>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: Signals the object that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 表示物件已完成初始設定。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Setter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Setter>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the object this <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> is intended for.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件的名稱，此<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>適合。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to the name of any element within the scope of where the setter collection (the collection that this setter is part of) is applied.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定此屬性的 setter 集合 （屬於這個 setter 集合） 套用所在的範圍內的任何項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is typically a named element that is within the template that contains this setter.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是具名的項目內樣板，含有這個 setter。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to apply to the property that is specified by this <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至這由所指定屬性的值<xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *value* An object or a markup extension.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*值*物件或標記延伸。

trans-unit.source: See [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[StaticResource 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A> and Value properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> or an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須同時指定<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A>和 Value 屬性上<xref:System.Windows.Setter>，否則會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data binding and dynamic resources within the object is supported if the specified value is a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值是受支援資料繫結和動態的資源，在物件內<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: See [Binding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[繫結標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the specified Value is set to <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值設定為<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue"> </xref>。
